Name: Director Drafts
Description: Episodes of Screen Drafts that focus on the output of a single director.

Name: Genre Drafts
Description: Genre Drafts are drafts that are restricted by a large, overreaching genre. Many of these drafts may have other modifiers to further narrow down the selection, including Topic, Decade or Studio.

Name: Producer Drafts
Description: Episodes of Screen Drafts where the eligibility is limited to a single producer.

Name: Christmas Drafts
Description: Episodes of Screen Drafts featuring a topic centered around Christmas. Typically (but not always) released in the weeks proceeding Christmas.

Name: Documentary Drafts
Description: Episodes of Screen Drafts where the eligibility pool is restricted solely to documentary films.

Name: Franchise Drafts
Description: Episodes of Screen Drafts where films from a single or multiple franchises are drafted.

Name: LGBTQ Drafts
Description: Drafts that delve into the LGBTQ+ topics.

Name: Live Drafts
Description: Drafts that were recorded live, often as part of film festivals.

Name: Studio Drafts
Description: Studio Drafts are drafts where the eligibility pool is restricted to a single production studio.

Name: Topic Drafts
Description: Drafts that focus on a certain topic, rather than an individual or genre.

Name: Verses Drafts
Description: Drafts where titles from different series or starring different actors that share a common link are combined for a single eligibility pool.

Name: Year Drafts
Description: Drafts where the eligibility pool is limited to a single U.S. release year.

Name: Writer Drafts
Description: Drafters based on the screenwriter of the motion picture. For drafts based on the shared creator of the source material, see Author Drafts.

Name: Author Drafts
Description: Episodes of Screen Drafts where the eligibility pool is limited to a single creator of the source material. For episodes that share a single screenwriter, see Writer Drafts.

Name: Series Drafts
Description: Episodes of Screen Drafts where titles from a single series of films or multiple series of films sharing a thematic link are drafted. Typically, but not always, presented as Super Drafts.

Name: Award Drafts
Description: Episodes where titles come from a specific award.
